DbSql.sql: select name FROM master.dbo.sysdatabases WHERE dbid>4 order by name asc

SELECT name,cuser,type,dates,comments FROM (SELECT sb.name,sys.sysusers.name AS cuser,sb.xtype AS type,sb.crdate AS dates, CONVERT(VARCHAR(200),ISNULL(ep.value,'')) AS comments FROM sys.sysobjects AS sb LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT major_id,value FROM sys.extended_properties WHERE (name='MS_Description') AND (minor_id=0) ) AS ep ON sb.id=ep.major_id INNER JOIN sys.sysusers ON sb.uid=sys.sysusers.uid WHERE (sb.xtype='U' OR sb.xtype='V') AND sys.sysusers.name='dbo' AND category!=2) AS tt ORDER BY tt.name

select * from (SELECT C.column_id AS colorder, O.name AS TableName, C.name AS ColumnName, CONVERT(varchar(200), ISNULL(PFD.value, N'')) AS deText, T.name AS TypeName, C.max_length AS Length, C.precision AS Preci, C.scale AS Scale, C.is_identity AS IsIdentity, ISNULL(IDX_1.PrimaryKey, 0) AS isPK, C.is_computed AS isComputed, C.is_nullable AS isNull, ISNULL(IDX_1.IndexName, N'') AS IndexName, ISNULL(IDX_1.Sort, N'') AS IndexSort, O.create_date AS Create_Date, O.modify_date AS Modify_Date, ISNULL(D.definition, N'') AS defaultVal, sb.name AS rftable, sc.name AS rfcolumn FROM sys.columns AS C INNER JOIN sys.objects AS O ON C.object_id = O.object_id AND (O.type = 'U' OR O.type = 'V') AND O.is_ms_shipped = 0 INNER JOIN sys.types AS T ON C.user_type_id = T.user_type_id LEFT OUTER JOIN sys.default_constraints AS D ON C.object_id = D.parent_object_id AND C.column_id = D.parent_column_id AND C.default_object_id = D.object_id LEFT OUTER JOIN sys.extended_properties AS PFD ON PFD.class = 1 AND C.object_id = PFD.major_id AND C.column_id = PFD.minor_id LEFT OUTER JOIN sys.extended_properties AS PTB ON PTB.class = 1 AND PTB.minor_id = 0 AND LEFT(PTB.name, 3) != 'MS_' AND C.object_id = PTB.major_id LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT IDXC.object_id, IDXC.column_id, CASE INDEXKEY_PROPERTY(IDXC.[object_id], IDXC.index_id, IDXC.index_column_id, 'IsDescending') WHEN 1 THEN 'DESC' WHEN 0 THEN 'ASC' ELSE '' END AS Sort, IDX.is_primary_key AS PrimaryKey, IDX.name AS IndexName FROM sys.indexes AS IDX INNER JOIN sys.index_columns AS IDXC ON IDX.object_id = IDXC.object_id AND IDX.index_id = IDXC.index_id LEFT OUTER JOIN sys.key_constraints AS KC ON IDX.object_id = KC.parent_object_id AND IDX.index_id = KC.unique_index_id INNER JOIN (SELECT object_id, column_id, MIN(index_id) AS index_id FROM sys.index_columns GROUP BY object_id, column_id) AS IDXCUQ ON IDXC.object_id = IDXCUQ.object_id AND IDXC.column_id = IDXCUQ.column_id AND IDXC.index_id = IDXCUQ.index_id) AS IDX_1 ON C.object_id = IDX_1.object_id AND C.column_id = IDX_1.column_id LEFT OUTER JOIN sys.sysforeignkeys AS h ON O.object_id = h.fkeyid AND h.fkey = C.column_id LEFT OUTER JOIN sys.sysobjects AS sb ON sb.id = h.rkeyid LEFT OUTER JOIN sys.syscolumns AS sc ON sb.id = sc.id AND sc.colorder = h.rkey) AS tt
SELECT b.name AS ProName,isnull(a.text,'')text,a.colid,b.crdate FROM sys.syscomments AS a INNER JOIN sys.sysobjects AS b ON a.id=OBJECT_ID(b.name) WHERE (b.xtype IN ('P','TR')) ORDER BY ProName

SELECT sys.sysobjects.name AS ProName, sys.syscolumns.name AS ParName, type_name(sys.syscolumns.xusertype) AS TypeName, sys.syscolumns.length, sys.syscolumns.iscomputed, sys.syscolumns.isoutparam, sys.syscolumns.isnullable, sys.syscolumns.prec, sys.syscolumns.scale FROM sys.syscolumns LEFT OUTER JOIN sys.sysobjects ON sys.syscolumns.id = sys.sysobjects.id WHERE (OBJECTPROPERTY(sys.sysobjects.id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) ORDER BY ProName, sys.syscolumns.colid
